description.english: Start a new game.
description.french: Commencez une nouvelle partie.
description.italian: Avvia una nuova partita.
description.spanish: Empieza una partida nueva.
description.schinese: 开始新游戏。
description.tchinese: 開始新遊戲。
description.russian: Начать новую игру.
description.brazilian: Comece um novo jogo.

description.english: Complete the Tutorial.
description.french: Terminez le didacticiel.
description.italian: Completa il tutorial.
description.spanish: Completa el tutorial.
description.schinese: 完成教程。
description.tchinese: 完成教學。
description.russian: Пройдите обучение.
description.brazilian: Conclua o tutorial.

description.english: Build a Control Room.
description.french: Construisez une salle de contrôle.
description.italian: Costruisci una sala di controllo.
description.spanish: Construye una sala de control.
description.schinese: 建造一个控制室。
description.tchinese: 建造控制室。
description.russian: Постройте центр управления.
description.brazilian: Construa uma Sala de Controle.

displayName.english: A Place To Call Your Own

description.english: Build an Inner Sanctum.
description.french: Construisez un sanctuaire.
description.italian: Costruisci un sancta sanctorum.
description.spanish: Construye un refugio privado.
description.schinese: 建造一个指挥室。
description.tchinese: 建造私人聖殿。
description.russian: Постройте личный кабинет.
description.brazilian: Construa um Reduto Nefasto.

displayName.german: Sie sind dir auf der Spur …

description.english: Have one Region enter Lockdown.
description.german: Löse in einer Region einen Lockdown aus.
description.french: Provoquez le verrouillage d'une région.
description.italian: Fai in modo che una regione entri in lockdown.
description.spanish: Haz que una zona quede confinada.
description.schinese: 让一个地区进入封锁状态。
description.tchinese: 封鎖一處地區。
description.russian: Доведите один из регионов до блокады.
description.brazilian: Faça uma região entrar em confinamento.

description.english: Take care of an intruder, and then destroy the evidence.
description.german: Kümmere dich um einen Eindringling und zerstöre dann die Beweise.
description.french: Neutralisez un intrus et détruisez les preuves.
description.italian: Occupati di un intruso e distruggi le prove.
description.spanish: Ocúpate de un intruso y luego destruye las pruebas.
description.schinese: 收拾掉一个入侵者，然后毁灭证据。
description.tchinese: 解決入侵者並摧毀證據。
description.russian: Разберитесь с нарушителем, а затем уничтожьте все улики.
description.brazilian: Lide com um intruso, depois destrua as provas.

description.english: Have 20 minions in the Lair.
description.french: Rassemblez 20 sbires dans votre base.
description.italian: Ottieni 20 servitori nel covo.
description.spanish: Ten 20 esbirros en la guarida.
description.schinese: 老巢中拥有20名喽啰。
description.tchinese: 巢穴手下人數滿20名。
description.russian: Доведите число прислужников в Логове до 20.
description.brazilian: Tenha 20 lacaios no covil.

displayName.schinese: 一支穿云箭，千军万马来相见

description.english: Recruit 300 minions at once.
description.french: Rassemblez 300 sbires dans votre base.
description.italian: Recluta 300 servitori in una sola volta.
description.spanish: Alcanza la cifra de 300 esbirros a tu servicio.
description.schinese: 同时招募300名喽啰。
description.tchinese: 一次招募300名手下。
description.russian: Наймите 300 прислужников единовременно.
description.brazilian: Tenha 300 lacaios.

description.english: Complete the Game as Emma on any Difficulty.

description.tchinese: 使用艾瑪以任意難度完成遊戲。

description.tchinese: 訓練一名反特務。

displayName.spanish: Todas las herramientas de la caja

description.english: Unlock all minion types.
description.french: Débloquez tous les types de sbires.
description.italian: Sblocca tutti i tipi di servitori.
description.spanish: Desbloquea todos los tipos de esbirro.
description.schinese: 解锁所有喽啰类型。
description.tchinese: 解鎖所有手下類型。
description.russian: Откройте все виды прислужников.
description.brazilian: Desbloqueie todos os tipos de lacaios.

description.english: Steal one Loot Item.
description.french: Volez un élément de butin.
description.italian: Ruba un oggetto di bottino.
description.spanish: Toma un objeto como botín.
description.schinese: 偷取一件战利品。
description.tchinese: 偷竊戰利品。
description.russian: Украдите какую-нибудь добычу.
description.brazilian: Roube um item de saque.

description.english: Steal Seven Loot Items in a single game.
description.german: Stiehl im Laufe einer Partie sieben Beutegegenstände.
description.french: Volez 7 éléments de butin dans la même partie.
description.italian: Ruba sette oggetti di bottino in una singola partita.
description.spanish: Toma siete objetos como botín en una misma partida.
description.schinese: 单场游戏中偷取七件战利品。
description.tchinese: 在一場遊戲偷竊七個戰利品。
description.russian: Украдите семь предметов за одну игру.
description.brazilian: Roube 7 itens de saque em um único jogo.

description.english: Steal Fifteen Loot Items in a single game.
description.german: Stiehl im Laufe einer Partie 15 Beutegegenstände.
description.french: Volez 15 éléments de butin dans la même partie.
description.italian: Ruba quindici oggetti di bottino in una singola partita.
description.spanish: Toma quince objetos como botín en una misma partida.
description.schinese: 单场游戏中偷取十五件战利品。
description.tchinese: 在一場遊戲偷竊十五個戰利品。
description.russian: Украдите пятнадцать предметов за одну игру.
description.brazilian: Roube 15 itens de saque em um único jogo.

description.english: Steal Twenty Loot Items in a single game.
description.german: Stiehl im Laufe einer Partie 20 Beutegegenstände.
description.french: Volez 20 éléments de butin dans la même partie.
description.italian: Ruba venti oggetti di bottino in una singola partita.
description.spanish: Toma veinte objetos como botín en una misma partida.
description.schinese: 单场游戏中偷取二十件战利品。
description.tchinese: 在一場遊戲偷竊二十個戰利品。
description.russian: Украдите двадцать предметов за одну игру.
description.brazilian: Roube 20 itens de saque em um único jogo.

description.english: Steal every available Loot item in a single playthrough.
description.german: Stiehl im Laufe einer Partie alle verfügbaren Beutegegenstände.
description.french: Volez tous les éléments de butin disponibles dans la même partie.
description.italian: Ruba tutti gli oggetti di bottino disponibili in una singola partita.
description.spanish: Toma como botín todos los objetos disponibles en una misma partida.
description.schinese: 单场游戏中偷取所有可偷的战利品。
description.tchinese: 在一場遊戲偷竊所有可偷的戰利品。
description.russian: Украдите всю доступную добычу за одну игру.
description.brazilian: Roube todos os itens de saque em um único jogo.

description.english: Recruit a Henchman.
description.french: Recrutez un homme de main.
description.italian: Recluta uno scagnozzo.
description.spanish: Recluta a un lugarteniente.
description.schinese: 招募一名心腹。
description.tchinese: 招募一名黨羽。
description.russian: Наймите приспешника.
description.brazilian: Recrute um comparsa.

description.english: Recruit three Henchmen in a single game.
description.german: Rekrutiere im Laufe einer Partie drei Handlanger.
description.french: Recrutez 3 hommes de main dans la même partie.
description.italian: Recluta tre scagnozzi in una singola partita.
description.spanish: Recluta a tres lugartenientes en una misma partida.
description.schinese: 单场游戏中招募三名心腹。
description.tchinese: 在一場遊戲招募三個黨羽。
description.russian: Наймите трех приспешников за одну игру.
description.brazilian: Recrute três comparsas em um único jogo.

description.english: Recruit five Henchmen in a single game.
description.german: Rekrutiere im Laufe einer Partie fünf Handlanger.
description.french: Recrutez 5 hommes de main dans la même partie.
description.italian: Recluta cinque scagnozzi in una singola partita.
description.spanish: Recluta a cinco lugartenientes en una misma partida.
description.schinese: 单场游戏中招募五名心腹。
description.tchinese: 在一場遊戲招募五個黨羽。
description.russian: Наймите пятерых приспешников за одну игру.
description.brazilian: Recrute cinco comparsas em um único jogo.

description.english: Recruit all available Henchmen in a single playthrough. Some betrayal required.
description.german: Rekrutiere im Laufe einer Partie alle verfügbaren Handlanger. Erfordert auch etwas Verrat.
description.french: Recrutez tous les hommes de main disponibles dans la même partie. Trahisons requises.
description.italian: Recluta tutti gli scagnozzi disponibili in una singola partita. Sarà necessario tradire.
description.spanish: Recluta a todos los lugartenientes disponibles en una misma partida. Te hará falta traicionar de vez en cuando.
description.schinese: 单场游戏中招募所有可招募的心腹。需要一些背叛。
description.tchinese: 在一場遊戲招募所有可招募黨羽，需要幾次背叛才能達成。
description.russian: Наймите всех доступных прислужников за одну игру. Придется кого-то предавать.
description.brazilian: Recrute todos os comparsas em um único jogo. Envolve certa traição.

displayName.english: The Man With the M.I.D.A.S. Touch
displayName.brazilian: O Homem do Toque de M.I.D.A.S.

description.german: Feuere V.E.N.O.M. zum ersten Mal ab.
description.french: Déclenchez le V.E.N.O.M. pour la première fois.
description.italian: Utilizza V.E.L.E.N.O. per la prima volta.
description.spanish: Dispara V.E.N.E.N.O. por primera vez.
description.schinese: 首次发射狂仇毒气。
description.tchinese: 首次發射狂仇毒氣。
description.russian: Примените АСПИД первый раз.
description.brazilian: Dispare a V.E.N.E.N.O. pela primeira vez.

description.english: Fire V.O.I.D. for the first time.
description.german: Feuere V.O.I.D. zum ersten Mal ab.
description.french: Déclenchez le V.O.I.D. pour la première fois.
description.italian: Utilizza V.U.O.T.O. per la prima volta.
description.spanish: Dispara H.I.P.N.O. por primera vez.
description.schinese: 首次发射意识虚空。
description.tchinese: 首次發射意識虛空。
description.russian: Примените МРАК первый раз.
description.brazilian: Dispare a V.A.Z.I.O. pela primeira vez.

description.english: Fire a Doomsday Device at Strength 2.
description.french: Déclenchez une arme du jugement dernier au niveau de puissance 2.
description.italian: Utilizza il Dispositivo apocalittico a potenza 2.
description.spanish: Dispara una Máquina del Fin del Mundo con nivel 2 de potencia.
description.schinese: 发射强度等级为2的末日装置。
description.tchinese: 以強度2發射末日裝置。
description.russian: Примените оружие возмездия с силой 2.
description.brazilian: Dispare uma Máquina do Apocalipse com potência 2.

description.english: Fire a Doomsday Device at Strength 3.
description.french: Déclenchez une arme du jugement dernier au niveau de puissance 3.
description.italian: Utilizza il Dispositivo apocalittico a potenza 3.
description.spanish: Dispara una Máquina del Fin del Mundo con nivel 3 de potencia.
description.schinese: 发射强度等级为3的末日装置。
description.tchinese: 以強度3發射末日裝置。
description.russian: Примените оружие возмездия с силой 3.
description.brazilian: Dispare uma Máquina do Apocalipse com potência 3.

description.english: Destroy every Region. Permanently.
description.french: Détruisez toutes les régions. Définitivement.
description.italian: Distruggi ogni regione. Per sempre.
description.spanish: Destruye todas las zonas. Permanentemente.
description.schinese: 彻彻底底摧毁所有地区。
description.tchinese: 摧毀所有地區，一勞永逸。
description.russian: Уничтожьте все регионы. Навсегда.
description.brazilian: Destrua todas as regiões. Para sempre.

description.english: Defeat H.A.M.M.E.R.'s Super Agent once and for all.
description.french: Neutralisez le super agent du H.A.M.M.E.R. une bonne fois pour toutes.
description.italian: Sconfiggi la super-agente H.A.M.M.E.R. una volta per tutte.
description.spanish: Derrota definitivamente a la superagente de M.A.R.T.I.L.L.O.
description.schinese: 彻底击败H.A.M.M.E.R.的超级特工。
description.tchinese: 徹底擊敗H.A.M.M.E.R.的超級特務。
description.russian: Победите суперагента МОЛОТа раз и навсегда.
description.brazilian: Derrote a superagente da M.A.R.T.E.L.O. de uma vez por todas.

displayName.english: She Went Out Like A Wrecking Ball

description.english: Defeat S.A.B.R.E.'s Super Agent once and for all.
description.french: Neutralisez le super agent du S.A.B.R.E. une bonne fois pour toutes.
description.italian: Sconfiggi la super-agente S.A.B.R.E. una volta per tutte.
description.spanish: Derrota definitivamente a la superagente de S.A.B.L.E.
description.schinese: 彻底击败S.A.B.R.E.的超级特工。
description.tchinese: 徹底擊敗S.A.B.R.E.的超級特務。
description.russian: Победите суперагента МЕЧа раз и навсегда.
description.brazilian: Derrote a superagente da S.A.B.R.E. de uma vez por todas.

description.english: Defeat P.A.T.R.I.O.T.'s Super Agent once and for all.
description.french: Neutralisez le super agent du P.A.T.R.I.O.T. une bonne fois pour toutes.
description.italian: Sconfiggi il super-agente P.A.T.R.I.O.T. una volta per tutte.
description.spanish: Derrota definitivamente al superagente de P.A.T.R.I.O.T.A.
description.schinese: 彻底击败P.A.T.R.I.O.T.的超级特工。
description.tchinese: 徹底擊敗P.A.T.R.I.O.T.的超級特務。
description.russian: Победите суперагента ПАТРИОТа раз и навсегда.
description.brazilian: Derrote o superagente da P.A.T.R.I.O.T.A. de uma vez por todas.

description.english: Defeat A.N.V.I.L.'s Super Agent once and for all.
description.french: Neutralisez le super agent de l'A.N.V.I.L. une bonne fois pour toutes.
description.italian: Sconfiggi la super-agente A.N.V.I.L. una volta per tutte.
description.spanish: Derrota definitivamente a la superagente de Y.U.N.Q.U.E.
description.schinese: 彻底击败A.N.V.I.L.的超级特工。
description.tchinese: 徹底擊敗A.N.V.I.L.的超級特務。
description.russian: Победите суперагента ГОРНа раз и навсегда.
description.brazilian: Derrote a superagente da B.I.G.O.R.N.A. de uma vez por todas.

description.english: Defeat S.M.A.S.H.'s Super Agent once and for all.
description.french: Neutralisez le super agent du S.M.A.S.H. une bonne fois pour toutes.
description.italian: Sconfiggi il super-agente S.M.A.S.H. una volta per tutte.
description.spanish: Derrota definitivamente al superagente de S.M.A.S.H.
description.schinese: 彻底击败S.M.A.S.H.的超级特工。
description.tchinese: 徹底擊敗S.M.A.S.H.的超級特務。
description.russian: Победите суперагента УДАРа раз и навсегда.
description.brazilian: Derrote o superagente da E.S.M.A.G.A. de uma vez por todas.

description.english: Bring an end to a considerable threat.
description.french: Neutralisez une menace considérable.
description.italian: Metti fine a una minaccia considerevole.
description.spanish: Acaba con una amenaza considerable.
description.schinese: 清除一个相当大的威胁。
description.tchinese: 清除可觀的威脅。
description.russian: Положите конец существенной угрозе.
description.brazilian: Anule uma ameaça considerável.

displayName.spanish: A la altura de tus expectativas

description.english: Defeat every Super Agent once and for all.
description.french: Neutralisez définitivement tous les super agents.
description.italian: Sconfiggi tutti i super-agenti una volta per tutte.
description.spanish: Derrota definitivamente a todos los superagentes.
description.schinese: 彻底击败所有超级特工。
description.tchinese: 徹底擊敗所有超級特務。
description.russian: Победите всех суперагентов раз и навсегда.
description.brazilian: Derrote todos os superagentes de uma vez por todas.

description.english: Drop a certain agent into a specific trap.
description.german: Bugsiere einen gewissen Agenten in eine bestimmte Falle.
description.french: Précipitez un certain agent dans un piège bien précis.
description.italian: Rilascia un certo agente in una trappola specifica.
description.spanish: Haz que cierto agente caiga en cierta trampa.
description.schinese: 让特定特工落入特定陷阱。
description.tchinese: 讓特定特務落入指定陷阱。
description.russian: Бросьте определенного агента в специальную ловушку.
description.brazilian: Faça um certo agente cair em uma armadilha específica.

displayName.english: Perfectly Balanced, As All Things Should Be
displayName.italian: Perfettamente bilanciato, come tutto dovrebbe essere.
displayName.spanish: Perfectamente equilibrada, como debería serlo todo
displayName.russian: Идеальное равновесие, как и было сказано
displayName.brazilian: Equilíbrio Perfeito, Como Tudo Deve Ser

description.english: Allow the finest Rogue in the world to succeed.
description.german: Erlaube dem besten Schurken der Welt erfolgreich zu sein.
description.french: Laissez la plus grande voleuse du monde réussir son coup.
description.italian: Permetti al miglior ladro del mondo di avere successo.
description.spanish: Permite que la mejor pícara del mundo se salga con la suya.
description.schinese: 让世界上最出色的盗贼得手。
description.tchinese: 讓世上最出色的盜賊得手。
description.russian: Позвольте лучшему вору в мире преуспеть.
description.brazilian: Permita que o melhor Ladino do mundo seja bem-sucedido.

description.english: Defeat the finest Saboteur in the world with Jubei.
description.german: Besiege mit Jubei den besten Saboteur der Welt.
description.french: Neutralisez le plus grand saboteur du monde avec Jubei.
description.italian: Sconfiggi il migliore sabotatore del mondo con Jubei.
description.spanish: Derrota al mejor saboteador del mundo con Jubei.
description.schinese: 用十兵卫击败世界上最出色的破坏狂。
description.tchinese: 使用十兵衛擊敗世上最出色的破壞狂。
description.russian: Победите лучшего диверсанта в мире при помощи Дзюбея.
description.brazilian: Derrote o melhor Sabotador do mundo com o Jubei.

description.english: Set H.A.M.M.E.R.'s Super Agent aflame.
description.french: Enflammez le super agent du H.A.M.M.E.R.
description.italian: Dai fuoco alla super-agente H.A.M.M.E.R.
description.spanish: Haz arder a la superagente de M.A.R.T.I.L.L.O.
description.schinese: 让H.A.M.M.E.R.的超级特工烈火焚身。
description.tchinese: 讓H.A.M.M.E.R.的超級特務著火
description.russian: Подожгите суперагента МОЛОТа.
description.brazilian: Faça a superagente da M.A.R.T.E.L.O. pegar fogo.

description.english: Clone a minion with the Cloning Machine and… deal… with the inferior copy.
description.german: Klone einen Schergen mit der Klonmaschine und ... kümmere dich ... um die minderwertige Kopie.
description.french: Clonez un sbire avec la machine de clonage et... supprimez la version inférieure.
description.italian: Clona un servitore con la macchina clonatrice e... occupati... della copia scadente.
description.spanish: Clona a un esbirro con la máquina clonadora y… ocúpate… de la copia inferior.
description.schinese: 用克隆机克隆一个喽啰，然后……处理掉……他们中的次品。
description.tchinese: 使用複製機器複製一名手下……再處理掉其中的次品。
description.russian: Клонируйте прислужника в аппарате и... разберитесь... с худшим экземпляром.
description.brazilian: Clone um lacaio com a Máquina de Clonar e... dê um jeito na cópia inferior.

displayName.brazilian: A Vida é para ser Vivida

description.english: Die for the first time.
description.french: Mourez pour la première fois.
description.italian: Muori per la prima volta.
description.spanish: Muere por primera vez.
description.schinese: 首次死亡。
description.tchinese: 首次死亡。
description.russian: Умрите первый раз.
description.brazilian: Morra pela primeira vez.

description.english: Have one million Gold in the Vault.
description.german: Horte eine Milliarde Gold in deinem Tresorraum.
description.french: Accumulez un milliard en or dans la chambre forte.
description.italian: Custodisci un miliardo d'oro nel caveau.
description.spanish: Acumula oro por valor de mil millones en la cámara acorazada.
description.schinese: 金库中有十亿黄金。
description.tchinese: 金庫有十億黃金。
description.russian: Скопите миллиард в сокровищнице.
description.brazilian: Tenha um bilhão de ouro no cofre.

displayName.english: I'll Take Care of This Myself
displayName.french: Jamais mieux servi que par soi-même

description.english: Defeat a Super Agent with your Genius.
description.german: Besiege einen Superagenten mit deinem Genie.
description.french: Neutralisez un super agent avec votre génie.
description.italian: Sconfiggi un super-agente con il tuo genio.
description.spanish: Derrota a un superagente con tu genio.
description.schinese: 用邪恶天才击败一个超级特工。
description.tchinese: 使用天才擊敗一名超級特務。
description.russian: Победите суперагента при помощи своего Гения.
description.brazilian: Derrote um superagente com o seu Gênio.

description.english: Upgrade 23 Criminal Networks to Level 4.
description.french: Améliorez 23 réseaux criminels au niveau 4.
description.italian: Potenzia 23 reti criminali al livello 4.
description.spanish: Mejora 23 redes criminales hasta el nivel 4.
description.schinese: 将23个犯罪网络升至4级。
description.tchinese: 將23個犯罪網路升至等級4。
description.russian: Переведите 23 преступные сети на уровень 4.
description.brazilian: Melhore 23 Redes Criminosas até o nível 4.

displayName.spanish: El mal no conoce la piedad

description.english: Execute a loyal Henchman.
description.french: Exécutez un homme de main loyal.
description.italian: Giustizia uno scagnozzo leale.
description.spanish: Mata a un lugarteniente leal.
description.schinese: 处决一名忠心耿耿的心腹。
description.tchinese: 處決一名忠心耿耿的黨羽。
description.russian: Казните верного приспешника.
description.brazilian: Execute um comparsa leal.

description.english: Use your Casino to completely drain the Resolve of 200 Agents.
description.german: Entziehe mit deinem Casino 200 Agenten jegliche Entschlossenheit.
description.french: Utilisez votre casino pour saper totalement la détermination de 200 agents.
description.italian: Usa il casinò per prosciugare completamente la determinazione di 200 Agenti.
description.spanish: Utiliza tu casino para reducir a cero la motivación de 200 agentes.
description.schinese: 使用你的赌场榨干200名特工的决心。
description.tchinese: 利用賭場耗盡200名特務的決心。
description.russian: Полностью лишите решимости 200 агентов при помощи казино.
description.brazilian: Use seu Cassino para esgotar a Determinação de 200 agentes.

description.english: Generate 50,000 gold in your Casino.
description.german: Nimm mit deinem Casino 50.000 Gold ein.
description.french: Générez 50 000 en or dans votre casino.
description.italian: Genera 50.000 di oro nel casinò.
description.spanish: Genera 50 000 unidades de oro en tu casino.
description.schinese: 用你的赌场赚取50000黄金。
description.tchinese: 利用賭場賺進50,000黃金。
description.russian: Получите 50000 в казино.
description.brazilian: Gere 50.000 de ouro no Cassino.

displayName.english: No no no no no no…!
displayName.italian: No no no no no no…!

description.english: Combo Giant Fan into Shark Tank.
description.french: Combinez ventilateur géant et bassin à requins.
description.italian: Combina un ventilatore gigante con una vasca degli squali.
description.spanish: Combina un ventilador gigante con un tanque de tiburones.
description.schinese: 让巨型风扇和鲨鱼池形成组合陷阱。
description.tchinese: 使用巨大風扇和鯊魚池組成陷阱。
description.russian: Скомбинируйте гигантский вентилятор и бассейн с акулами.
description.brazilian: Faça um combo com Ventilador Gigante e Tanque de Tubarões.

description.english: Blow a Gas Cloud into an Agent with a Giant Fan.
description.german: Blase mit einem Riesenventilator einem Agenten eine Giftwolke ins Gesicht.
description.french: Projetez un nuage de gaz sur un agent avec un ventilateur géant.
description.italian: Soffia una nuvola di gas su un agente con un ventilatore gigante.
description.spanish: Usa un ventilador gigante para atacar a un agente con una nube de gas.
description.schinese: 用巨型风扇将毒气云吹向一名特工。
description.tchinese: 使用巨型風扇將毒氣雲吹向特務。
description.russian: Сдуйте на агента облако газа гигантским вентилятором.
description.brazilian: Use um Ventilador Gigante para assoprar uma nuvem de gás contra um agente.

description.english: Bounce one Agent against 3 Pinball Bumpers.
description.german: Lass einen Agenten gegen drei Flipper-Bumper prallen.
description.french: Faites rebondir un agent contre 3 Pare-chocs
description.italian: Fai rimbalzare un agente contro 3 paracolpi flipper.
description.spanish: Haz botar a un agente contra 3 rebotadores de petacos.
description.schinese: 用三个三维弹球杠弹一个特工。
description.tchinese: 使用三枚彈珠彈跳器彈跳一名特務。
description.russian: Ударьте агентом по трем пинбольным бамперам.
description.brazilian: Faça um agente quicar em 3 Bumpers de Pinball.

description.english: Combo Giant Fan into Boxing Glove.
description.french: Combinez ventilateur géant et gant de boxe.
description.italian: Combina un ventilatore gigante con un guantone da boxe.
description.spanish: Combina un ventilador gigante con un guante de boxeo.
description.schinese: 让巨型风扇和拳击手套形成组合陷阱。
description.tchinese: 使用風扇和拳擊手套組成陷阱。
description.russian: Скомбинируйте вентилятор и боксерскую перчатку.
description.brazilian: Faça um combo com Ventilador Gigante e Luva de Boxe.

description.english: Combo Boxing Glove into Bees.
description.french: Combinez gant de boxe et abeilles.
description.italian: Combina un guantone da boxe con le api.
description.spanish: Combina un guante de boxeo con abejas.
description.schinese: 让拳击手套和蜜蜂形成组合陷阱。
description.tchinese: 使用拳擊手套和蜜蜂組成陷阱。
description.russian: Скомбинируйте боксерскую перчатку и пчел.
description.brazilian: Faça um combo com Luva de Boxe e Abelhas Assassinas.

description.english: Combo Bubble Cannon and Slippery Floor.
description.french: Combinez canon à bulles et sol glissant.
description.italian: Combina uno spara bolle con un pavimento sdrucciolevole.
description.spanish: Combina un cañón de burbujas con suelo resbaladizo.
description.schinese: 让泡泡加农炮和滑溜地板形成组合陷阱。
description.tchinese: 使用大泡砲和滑溜地板組成陷阱。
description.russian: Скомбинируйте пузыри и скользкий пол.
description.brazilian: Faça um combo com Canhão-bolha e Piso Escorregadio.

description.english: Combo Giant Fan into Flamethrower.
description.french: Combinez ventilateur géant et lance-flammes mural.
description.italian: Combina un ventilatore gigante con un lanciafiamme.
description.spanish: Combina un ventilador gigante con un lanzallamas.
description.schinese: 让巨型风扇和火焰喷射器形成组合陷阱。
description.tchinese: 使用風扇和噴火器組成陷阱。
description.russian: Скомбинируйте вентилятор и огнемет.
description.brazilian: Faça um combo com Ventilador Gigante e Lança-chamas.

description.english: Combo Giant Fan into Laser Wall into Shark Tank.
description.german: Kombiniere Riesenventilator mit Laser-Wand und Haifischbecken.
description.french: Combinez ventilateur géant, mur laser et bassin à requins.
description.italian: Combina un ventilatore gigante con un muro laser con una vasca degli squali.
description.spanish: Combina un ventilador gigante con una pared láser y un tanque de tiburones.
description.schinese: 让巨型风扇、激光墙和鲨鱼池形成组合陷阱。
description.tchinese: 使用雷射牆和鯊魚池組成陷阱。
description.russian: Скомбинируйте вентилятор, лазерную стену и бассейн с акулами.
description.brazilian: Faça um combo com Ventilador Gigante, Parede Laser e Tanque de Tubarões.

description.english: Knock a Frozen Agent into a Shark Tank.
description.german: Schubse einen gefrorenen Agenten in ein Haifischbecken.
description.french: Poussez un agent gelé dans un bassin à requins.
description.italian: Spingi un agente congelato in una vasca degli squali.
description.spanish: Empuja a un agente congelado hasta un tanque de tiburones.
description.schinese: 将一名被冰冻的特工扔进鲨鱼池。
description.tchinese: 將結凍的特務丟進鯊魚池。
description.russian: Столкните замороженного агента в бассейн с акулой.
description.brazilian: Derrube um agente congelado em um Tanque de Tubarões.

description.english: Knock a Frozen Agent into a Pinball Bumper.
description.german: Schubse einen gefrorenen Agenten in einen Flipper-Bumper.
description.french: Poussez un agent gelé dans un bumper de flipper.
description.italian: Spingi un agente congelato contro un paracolpi flipper.
description.spanish: Empuja a un agente congelado hasta un rebotador de petacos.
description.schinese: 将一名被冰冻的特工扔进三维弹球杠陷阱。
description.tchinese: 將結凍的特務丟進彈珠彈跳器。
description.russian: Толкните замороженного агента на пинбольный бампер.
description.brazilian: Derrube um agente congelado em um Bumper de Pinball.

displayName.french: On ne vous la fait pas !

description.english: As Emma, remove 50 Agent Disguises.
description.french: Avec Emma, démasquez 50 agents déguisés.
description.italian: Nei panni di Emma, rimuovi 50 agenti travestiti.
description.spanish: Elimina el disfraz de 50 agentes jugando con Emma.
description.schinese: 扮演埃玛，纠出50名伪装的特工。
description.tchinese: 使用艾瑪除去50名特務的偽裝。
description.russian: Снимите с агентов маскировку при помощи Эммы 50 раз.
description.brazilian: Controlando Emma, remova 50 disfarces de agente.

description.english: As Emma, capture and mock a pale imitation during 'The Melting Point Of Steele.'
description.german: Fange mit Emma während "Steele am Ziel" einen billigen Abklatsch ein und verspotte ihn.
description.french: Avec Emma, capturez et ridiculisez une pâle imitation dans "Comment gagner avec Steele".
description.italian: Nei panni di Emma, cattura e deridi una pallida imitazione durante "Steele in fusione".
description.spanish: Captura y búrlate de una burda imitación jugando con Emma durante «Quien a acero mata…»
description.schinese: 扮演埃玛，在“斯地不容尔”中抓住并取笑一个山寨冒牌货。
description.tchinese: 扮演艾瑪，在「斯第不容爾」逮住並嘲笑山寨冒牌貨。
description.russian: Играя за Эмму, захватить жалкое подобие и поглумиться над ним во время задания «Точка плавления стали».
description.brazilian: Controlando Emma, capture e zombe de uma imitação ruim durante "Derrete, Steele".

description.english: As Emma, complete all the Genius Upgrade Research.
description.french: Avec Emma, terminez toutes les recherches d'améliorations de génie.
description.italian: Nei panni di Emma, completa tutte le ricerche potenziamento genio.
description.spanish: Completa todas las investigaciones para la mejora del genio jugando como Emma.
description.schinese: 扮演埃玛，完成所有邪恶天才升级研究。
description.tchinese: 使用艾瑪完成所有天才升級研究。
description.russian: Дайте Эмме завершить все исследования по улучшению гения.
description.brazilian: Controlando Emma, conclua todas as pesquisas de melhorias de Gênio.

description.english: As Ivan, kill 50 Agents using an old school weapon.
description.german: Töte in der Rolle von Iwan 50 Agenten mit einer Old-School-Waffe.
description.french: Avec Ivan, tuez 50 agents avec une bonne vieille arme à l'ancienne.
description.italian: Nei panni di Ivan, uccidi 50 agenti usando un'arma vecchio stile.
description.spanish: Mata a 50 agentes usando un arma de la vieja escuela jugando como Iván.
description.schinese: 扮演伊文，用老式武器杀死50名特工。
description.tchinese: 使用艾文，並用老派武器擊殺50名特務。
description.russian: Дайте Ивану убить 50 агентов оружием старой школы.
description.brazilian: Controlando Ivan, mate 50 agentes usando uma arma à moda antiga.

description.english: As Ivan, engage Atomic Olga in hand-to-hand combat.
description.german: Konfrontiere mit Iwan Atom-Olga bei einem Nahkampf.
description.french: Avec Ivan, affrontez Olga Tomique au corps à corps.
description.italian: Nei panni di Ivan, affronta Atomica Olga in un combattimento corpo a corpo.
description.spanish: Enfréntate mano a mano a Olga la Atómica jugando como Iván.
description.schinese: 扮演伊文，与原子奥尔佳近身肉搏。
description.tchinese: 使用艾文與原子歐爾嘉來場肉搏戰。
description.russian: Дайте Ивану сразиться с Ядерной Ольгой в рукопашном бою.
description.brazilian: Controlando Ivan, enfrente a Olga Atômica no mano a mano.

displayName.german: Bringen wir die alte Clique wieder zusammen
displayName.spanish: Volver a reunir a la pandilla

description.english: As Ivan, recruit some old friends.
description.german: Rekrutiere mit Iwan einige alte Freunde.
description.french: Avec Ivan, recrutez de vieux amis.
description.italian: Nei panni di Ivan, recluta qualche vecchio amico.
description.spanish: Recluta a unos cuantos viejos amigos jugando como Iván.
description.schinese: 扮演伊文，招募一些老朋友。
description.tchinese: 使用艾文招募幾個老朋友。
description.russian: Помогите Ивану заручиться помощью старых друзей.
description.brazilian: Controlando Ivan, recrute velhos amigos.

description.english: As Max, create 20 Golden Statues, and add them to the Inner Sanctum.
description.german: Stelle mit Max 20 Goldstatuen her und deponiere sie im Refugium.
description.french: Avec Max, créez 20 statues d'or et installez-les dans votre sanctuaire.
description.italian: Nei panni di Max, crea 20 statue d'oro e aggiungile al Sancta sanctorum.
description.spanish: Crea 20 estatuas de oro y añádelas a tu refugio privado jugando como Max.
description.schinese: 扮演麦斯，创造20尊金雕像，并将它们添加到指挥室。
description.tchinese: 使用麥斯米蘭創造20尊金雕像，並搬到私人聖殿擺放。
description.russian: Дайте Максу создать 20 золотых статуй и поставить их в личном кабинете.
description.brazilian: Controlando Max, crie 20 estátuas douradas e coloque-as no Reduto Nefasto.

description.english: As Max, have 200 Specialist minions in the Lair at once.
description.german: Beschäftige mit Max 200 spezialisierte Schergen gleichzeitig im Unterschlupf.
description.french: Avec Max, rassemblez 200 spécialistes dans votre base.
description.italian: Nei panni di Max, ottieni 200 servitori specialisti nel covo in una sola volta.
description.spanish: Ten a 200 esbirros especialistas a la vez en la guarida jugando como Max.
description.schinese: 扮演麦斯，让老巢中同时有200名专家喽啰。
description.tchinese: 使用麥斯米蘭讓巢穴同時有200名專家手下。
description.russian: Помогите Максу завести 200 прислужников-специалистов одновременно.
description.brazilian: Controlando Max, tenha 200 lacaios Especialistas no covil ao mesmo tempo.

description.english: As Max, complete the Henchmen Upgrade Research.
description.french: Avec Max, terminez le projet de recherche d'amélioration des hommes de main.
description.italian: Nei panni di Max, completa la ricerca potenziamento scagnozzi.
description.spanish: Completa todas las investigaciones para la mejora de los lugartenientes jugando como Max.
description.schinese: 扮演麦斯，完成心腹升级研究。
description.tchinese: 使用麥斯米蘭完成所有黨羽升級研究。
description.russian: Дайте Максу завершить все исследования по улучшению приспешников.
description.brazilian: Controlando Max, conclua todas as pesquisas de melhorias de Comparsa.

description.english: As Zalika, convert 50 Agents to your cause.
description.german: Konvertiere mit Zalika 50 Agenten zu deiner Seite.
description.french: Ralliez 50 agents à votre cause avec Zalika.
description.italian: Nei panni di Zalika, converti 50 agenti alla tua causa.
description.spanish: Gánate a 50 agentes para tu causa jugando como Zalika.
description.schinese: 扮演札莉卡，让50名特工倒向你这边。
description.tchinese: 使用札莉卡，讓50名特務轉而為你工作。
description.russian: Переманить 50 агентов на свою сторону, играя за Залику.
description.brazilian: Controlando Zalika, converta 50 agentes à sua causa.

displayName.spanish: La ciencia por encima de todo

description.english: As Zalika, Research everything.
description.french: Terminez tous les projets de recherche avec Zalika.
description.italian: Nei panni di Zalika, ricerca tutto.
description.spanish: Investígalo todo jugando como Zalika.
description.schinese: 扮演札莉卡，完成所有研究。
description.tchinese: 使用札莉卡完成所有研究。
description.russian: Завершить все исследования, играя за Залику.
description.brazilian: Controlando Zalika, pesquise tudo.

description.english: As Zalika, steal an extinct creature, one that is yet to hatch, and a treasure from another world.
description.german: Stiehl mit Zalika ein Tier, das ausgestorben ist, eines, das noch schlüpfen muss, und einen Schatz aus einer anderen Welt.
description.french: Obtenez une créature disparue, une autre pas encore née et un trésor venant d'un autre monde avec Zalika.
description.italian: Nei panni di Zalika, ruba una creatura estinta, una non ancora schiusa e un tesoro da un altro mondo.
description.spanish: Roba a una criatura extinta, otra que aún no ha nacido y un tesoro de otro mundo jugando como Zalika.
description.schinese: 扮演札莉卡，偷取一只已灭绝的生物、一只还未孵化的生物，以及一份来自另一个世界的宝藏。
description.tchinese: 使用札莉卡偷竊一隻已滅絕的生物、一隻還未孵化的生物，以及一個來自其他世界的寶藏。
description.russian: Играя за Залику, украсть вымершее животное, еще не вылупившегося монстра и сокровище из другого мира.
description.brazilian: Controlando Zalika, roube uma criatura extinta, uma que ainda está incubada e um tesouro de outro mundo.
